title: Bug 12398: Accessibility problems
description: When accessing the application, I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame) before it starts working. The Help view should be starting in a way that can be immediately navigated via the keyboard.
OB: The application requires manual interaction by clicking on one of the live areas before it becomes functional. The Help view is not initially navigable via keyboard.
EB: The application should start functioning without the need for manual interaction. The Help view should be accessible and navigable via keyboard from the start.
SR:
1. Open the application.
2. Observe that the application requires clicking on one of the live areas to start functioning.
3. Navigate to the Help view.
4. Observe that the Help view is not initially accessible via keyboard navigation.
